data.message: Eminem please check out Parker Loves Life page. she is a huge fan and would love love to meet you! She's 8 years old with DIPG with a life expectancy of less then a year. If you cant meet her please send her a video or even skype. We can keep it private!  Just would really make her day! You are the top of her bucket list. She doesnt want Disney World or princesses...she wants to meet Eminem! Nathan Kane Mathers
